post.title: Day 13: Chiang Mai Colours
post.description: The shadows of the women weaving new cloth bounced across the floors, the different colours of thread moving in and around each other becoming a masterpiece to add to the wall of blankets and scarves.
post.excerpt: Taking over 2 months to weave, the Thai blanket was made in a small village comprising of Catholic refugees from Cambodia and Laos allowedâ€¦
